OffsetManager

Contains functionality for setting and modifying machine offsets

Functions
ClearAllOffsets
call OffsetManager.ClearAllOffsets();

Remove all offsets from the machine

ApplyOffset
call OffsetManager.ApplyOffset(
offsetType,
offsetIndex,
&result
)

Apply a given offset to the machine, by providing the offset type and index.

Offset Types
Global

0,  _OFFSET_TYPE_GLOBAL

Component

1, _OFFSET_TYPE_COMPONENT

Work

2, _OFFSET_TYPE_WORK

Tool

3, _OFFSET_TYPE_TOOL

Feature

4, _OFFSET_TYPE_FEATURE

Note

The offset index can be found by viewing the offset table in the "Offsets" tab of the HMI motion component.

Parameters
offsetType

The type of offset to apply

offsetIndex

The specific offset to apply

ResponseParameters
&result

The result of the apply operation

SetOffset
call OffsetManager.SetOffset(
offsetType,
offsetIndex,
xAxis,
yAxis,
zAxis,
aAxis,
bAxis,
cAxis,
&errorCode
)

Set the given offset to the given values

Offset Types
Global

0,  _OFFSET_TYPE_GLOBAL

Component

1, _OFFSET_TYPE_COMPONENT

Work

2, _OFFSET_TYPE_WORK

Tool

3, _OFFSET_TYPE_TOOL

Feature

4, _OFFSET_TYPE_FEATURE

Note

The offset index can be found by viewing the offset table in the "Offsets" tab of the HMI motion component.

Parameters
offsetType

The type of offset to apply

offsetIndex

The specific offset to apply

xAxis

the 'x' value to set

yAxis

the 'y' value to set

zAxis

the 'z' value to set

aAxis

the 'a' value to set

bAxis

the 'b' value to set

cAxis

the 'c' value to set

ResponseParameters
&errorCode

The result of the set operation

GetOffset
call OffsetManager.GetOffset(
offsetType,
offsetIndex,
&xAxis,
&yAxis,
&zAxis,
&aAxis,
&bAxis,
&cAxis,
&result
)

Retrieve the values for a given offset.

The offset index can be found by viewing the offset table in the "Offsets" tab of the HMI motion component.

Parameters
offsetType

the type of offset to query

offsetIndex

the specific offset to query

Response Parameters
&xAxis

the X part of the offset

&yAxis

the Y part of the offset

&zAxis

the Z part of the offset

&aAxis

the A part of the offset

&bAxis

the B part of the offset

&cAxis

the C part of the offset

&result

the result of the query operation

IncrementOffset
call OffsetManager.IncrementOffset(
offsetType,
offsetIndex,
xAxis,
yAxis,
zAxis,
aAxis,
bAxis,
cAxis,
&result
)

Add the provided values to the specified offset.

Note

This is equivalent to calling GetOffset, adding the relevant numbers, and calling ApplyOffset with the result.

Parameters
offsetType

the type of offset to increment

offsetIndex

the specific offset to increment

xAxis

the X value to increment

yAxis

the Y value to increment

zAxis

the Z value to increment

aAxis

the A value to increment

bAxis

the B value to increment

cAxis

the C value to increment

Response Parameters
&result

The result of the increment operation

GetCount
call OffsetManager.GetCount(
offsetType,
&count,
&result
)

Retrieve number of available offsets of the specified type.

Parameters
offsetType

the type of offset being queried

Response Parameters
&count

the total number of offsets available for the given type

&result

the result of the query operation

GetAppliedIndex
call OffsetManager.GetAppliedIndex(
offsetType,
&index,
&result
)

Retrieve the applied index for the given offset type, or if no offset is applied, '-1'

Parameters
offsetType

the type of offset being queried

Response Parameters
&index

the applied index for the given offset type, or -1 if no offets of this type are applied

&result

the result of the query operation

TeachWorkOffsetCurrentPosition
call OffsetManager.TeachWorkOffsetCurrentPosition(
workOffsetIndex,
&result
)

Set the specified work offset to the machine's current position.

Parameters
workOffsetIndex

the work offset which should receive the current position

Response Parameters
&result

the result of the teach operation
